name: myfitnesspal_scrape_food
description: Scrape detailed nutrition info for a specific food on MyFitnessPal.

steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('h1, .food-name')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const nutrition = {}; document.querySelectorAll('.nutrition-facts tr, [class*="nutrient"], dl dt, dl dd').forEach(el => { const label = el.querySelector('td:first-child, dt')?.textContent?.trim()?.toLowerCase() || ''; const value = el.querySelector('td:last-child, dd, .value')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; if (label) nutrition[label] = value; }); return { name, nutrition, url: window.location.href };
steps.name: result
steps.label: Extract data
